dac_attr_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » Digital to Analog Converter (DAC)

DAC Attribute Data Structure. More...

#include <dac.h>

Collaboration diagram for dac_attr_t:

Detailed Description

This structure defines how the control structure for configuring the DAC port.

Data Fields

uint8_t pin_assign
 The GPIO configuration to use (see LPC17XXDEV)
 
uint8_t enabled_channels
 The DAC channels to enable.
 
uint32_t freq
 The output frequency.
